title: Average regular season home attendance of the Arizona Cardinals 2008 to 2019
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average attendance, containing a total of 12 data points.
In general Average attendance has stayed the same over the Year.

Average attendance is roughly constant from 2008 to 2010, slightly decreasing from 2010 to 2011, roughly constant from 2011 to 2013, slightly increasing from 2013 to 2015, and lastly slightly decreasing from 2015 to 2019.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2014 and 2015.
The highest Average attendance, of value 64831.0 was reached at Year 2016
Minimum Average attendance about 60890.0 was reached at Year 2012
